channel.title: Error Saving Account Info

item.title: Error Saving Account Info
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I added a command which they can use only once:
if(cmd[0].equals(“food”) && p.food < 1){
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 392, 1000);
p.food = 1;
}
After they do it, they cant do it right?
Wrong, they can log out and do the same thing over and oven again…
Any way to stop this?
I also added pk points, it aint saving, after relog it goes away.

Read full topic
